title: Emerald Cascade Jhumka - Green Elegance
materials: 18K Gold plated. Featuring emerald-cut emeralds and brilliant-cut diamonds
intricately set for maximum brilliance. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: This exquisite Jhumka features a unique cascade design with emeralds and diamonds. The central Emerald is set in a prong setting for an elegant look. The floral design near the top and bottom adds a touch of traditional South Indian jewelry design, reminiscent of classic temple jewelry (Devalayam designs).
colors: Dominant emerald green is beautifully contrasted with the brilliant white of the diamonds and the subtle gold hue of the gold plating. The combination creates a rich and luxurious appearance
occasions: and upscale evening events. A stunning choice for a half-saree function or any event where you want to make a grand statement.
description: This Jhumka perfectly blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern design principles. The high-quality gemstones and intricate craftsmanship ensure a durable and timeless piece. The use of emeralds, known for their association with prosperity and wisdom, adds symbolic value to the jewelry.
